name: Silas Silvanus, Faithful Brother
description:
There are stories about the lake. Something happened there. Somebody drowned. They were murdered. Or there was an accident. The stories change, but everybody knows it's dangerous. 

Psalm 12: Silas Silvanus, Faithful Brother is an interactive story about sex, fear, and coming of age in a small Christian community. 

Psalms is an anthology of short digital fiction. Some entries are games, others are visual novels. And some - well, you'll see. Check in for new psalms every quarter.
